reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and informative. Her passion for biology is contagious!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor. Makes complex algorithms seem easy. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting content, but lectures can be dry. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Prof. Garcia explains concepts clearly. Fair grader.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Best professor in the department! Lab sessions are well-organized and insightful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Monotonous lectures. Relies too heavily on memorization rather than critical thinking.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about the subject. Encourages lively class discussions.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes struggles to explain complex concepts to non-majors.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher. Relates course material to real-world issues effectively.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Clear explanations of economic theories. Assignments are challenging but fair.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Incredibly knowledgeable. Field trips to museums greatly enhance the learning experience.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Seems disorganized. Lecture content often strays from the syllabus.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fascinating course content. Dr. Kim is always willing to provide extra guidance.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Thought-provoking discussions, but grading criteria can be unclear.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Excellent professor. Incorporates current research into lectures. Great field work opportunities.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Brings real-world experience to the classroom. Group projects are particularly valuable.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting course material, but lectures can be hard to follow at times.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Exceptional teacher. Makes complex musical concepts accessible to all students.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Challenging but rewarding course. Dr. Green is passionate and knowledgeable.

reviews.subject: Civil Engineering
reviews.review: Solid understanding of the subject, but could improve on teaching methods.
